summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Lock-in Locks mobile React app prototype. All core functionality working correctly including state management, checkbox interactions, unlock celebration sequence, and lock logic evaluation.
passed_tests: Initial state: App loads with LOCKED status and both assignments unchecked
Assignment details: Lab 3 (CMPS 101) and Problem Set 5 (MATH 23A) display correctly
Checkbox interaction: Clicking toggles assignment done state successfully
Visual feedback: Checked assignments show green checkmark and strikethrough text
Lock state logic: Remains LOCKED with partial completion (1 of 2 checked)
Unlock celebration trigger: Checking final assignment triggers full-screen celebration
Celebration animation: Padlock swings open from red to green with smooth animation
Celebration text: 'All done. Lock released. You earned it.' displays correctly
Auto-dismiss: Celebration disappears after 3 seconds as specified
Post-celebration state: Returns to dashboard showing UNLOCKED with green padlock
Unlocked state persistence: Both assignments remain checked after celebration
Re-lock behavior: Unchecking assignment returns to LOCKED state
Empty state logic: All assignments unchecked shows LOCKED (correct per logic)
Mobile responsive: 390px mobile viewport renders correctly
CSS animations: All transitions and animations work smoothly
Accessibility: Proper data-testid attributes and aria-labels implemented
